mapper.insert: insert into tbl_comment (comment_content, member_id, post_id) values (#{commentContent}, #{memberId}, #{postId})
mapper.select: select c.id, c.comment_content, c.member_id, c.post_id, c.created_datetime, c.updated_datetime, u.user_name, m.member_profile_url as snsProfile, f.file_path as memberProfileUrl, jc.job_name from tbl_comment c join tbl_member m on c.member_id = m.user_id join tbl_user u on m.user_id = u.id left join tbl_user_job_category ujc on u.id = ujc.user_id left join tbl_job_category jc on ujc.job_category = jc.id left join tbl_user_profile_file upf on u.id = upf.user_id left join tbl_file f on upf.file_id = f.id where c.comment_status = 'active' and c.post_id = #{postId} order by c.created_datetime desc
select count(*) from tbl_comment where post_id = #{postId} and comment_status = 'active'
